events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund as it does not fit me well.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's description.
A customer support representative has been assigned to handle the refund inquiry.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with the refund for your recent jacket purchase.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been worn or washed?
My order number is 123456789, and I have not worn or washed the jacket yet, it is still in the original packaging.
Thank you for the info. You can return the jacket using the prepaid label we will email you shortly, and we will process your refund within 5 business days after receipt.
That sounds good, thank you for the quick response. I will send it back as soon as I receive the label.
The return process has been initiated and the prepaid shipping label sent. Your refund will be processed once we receive the jacket.
Just following up to confirm you have sent the jacket and to see if you need any further assistance.
Yes, I have dropped the jacket off at the post office yesterday. Thanks for checking in!
We have processed your refund successfully. Thank you for your cooperation, and please contact us again if needed.
